name: Runaway Train (itch)
description:
Runaway Train!

You're in the very last car when the brakes unmistakably, sickeningly fail. You've got to make it to the engine but the train is full. So.... You improvise.

Press Space or Mouse to Start, and 'R' to reset your Oculus headset.

Use your head or your mouse cursor.

Up to jump, Down to duck and left or right to sidestep.

Made by Raymond Stump, Robin Baumgarten, Charlie Hall and Gorm Lai during the 2016 Train Jam!
